channel.title: Using Org-mode and Emacs :: book.rymcg.tech
channel.description: Here are some tips on using Org-mode and Emacs. Index Editing Org-mode files

item.title: Editing Org-mode files
item.description: Indirect Buffers and Narrow To Subtree One of the advantages of Org-mode is you can organize lots of different articles into one big file. This is also a disadvantage when you are trying to focus on just one of them. It is easy to get lost. As an example, open the other book named d.rymcg.tech.org (found in this same directory). Letâ€™s say we want to focus on the chapter named Traefik Proxy.
